alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ojai Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains; Santa Ynez Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 02 at 1:52PM PST until March 03 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. Isolated temperatures in the upper 20s are possible, especially in Malibu Canyon. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Santa Ynez Valley, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys, Santa Monica Mountains and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
